website_summaries.verdict: Whether your top goal is organizing numerous cosmetics or packing them neatly for trips, this bag is likely all you need to stow and transport your beauty necessities.
pros: Folds up into a neat, compact unit, so the fact that it has three large see-through compartments and a removable bag doesn't make it too bulky to transport
Ideal for organizing and traveling with large collections
cons: A few reports of zippers breaking and the hanger coming loose from the material

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this a Thousand times over.
customer_reviews.text: Okay.... so when I got this bag I was a little disappointed because it looks way smaller than the pictures. When I started packing my products in the bag I realized that it was way bigger than I thought. it fit all my products and I still have more space to fit a lot more items. Oh and very stylish. great Buy
customer_reviews.author: Peta-Gaye Williams

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this travel cosmetic bag
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this travel cosmetic bag! Before buying this, I used to just pack my hair products, cleansers/skincare, toothpaste/toothbrush, etc., in separate gallon sized plastic bags that would get buried in my suitcase, and aren't exactly sturdy. This bag has 2 large clear compartments that fit things like standard-sized shampoo, lotion, hairbrush, etc, not just travel size, and 3 smaller side zip compartments. It zips and fold ups easily, to store in my suitcase. I traveled across Italy, staying in 4 different hotels, and this bag made keeping all my toiletries organized. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: WL

customer_reviews.title: Great size!
customer_reviews.text: I will be using this cosmetic bag when traveling for 2 weeks. I needed an organized bag with the ability to hold larger travel bottles. I am able to get full-size shampoo, condition, body wash, face wash, plus makeup and all the other materials needed to get ready in the mornings. I am very pleased with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love all the pockets
customer_reviews.text: Update to my 5 star review from a couple months ago - I used it this past week and the zipper broke on the top pocket. Lowering my 5 star rating to 4 stars. I can still use the bag but I'm sad it broke after only using it a half a dozen times. Great travel bag with lots of room! I like that you can hang it on a hook or towel rack too.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Fischer

customer_reviews.title: NOT STRUCTURED
customer_reviews.text: LOVE everything about this case as I can carry all my normal size products at a glance except for ONE THING... IT'S TOO SOFT AND LIMP, NOT STRUCTURED. The Pictures are deceiving! It looks like a soft sided semi-structured case when in fact it's some limp plastic like material; not even a sturdy heavy weight nylon. Durability is questionable at this point; we shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Highland Lass

customer_reviews.title: One of Amazon's best products
customer_reviews.text: Did not expect the bag to be this good, but very sturdy after 2 weeks of travel, super useful, and easy to use! The zippers zip with ease, it's nice to have see through pockets so you can see what's inside, the hook helps you hang it anywhere so if you have messy/dirty/unavailable countertops you can use the bag as your countertop to hold things, and this bag can pack A LOT! Absolutely love it. It may be expensive and that had put me off but it is now PRICELESS to me. Would definitely recommend this than a cheaper bag that may break on you! I expect to use this for a long time, anytime I travel anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Serendapple

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting...
customer_reviews.text: The pockets are nice and large. It's made well but not well enough to hold a lot of weight. I was disappointed at how small it was once zipped closed. I bought it for my cosmetics and when it's hanging they fit perfectly but it doesn't close. You have to remove half the items if you want it to be zipped up all the way. It's a great bag if you plan to hang it, not so great if you (like myself) are looking for something to transport all your items.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Met All The Needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift. She wanted a cosmetic bag large enough for full size containers of shampoo, etc, but one that was not heavy or bulky itself. This bag met all her needs. It holds everything, hangs easily and it is not bulky or heavy on its own. I am very pleased with this gift, and would readily purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jrolig

customer_reviews.title: Better than the one I lost!
customer_reviews.text: I lost my original travel bag in Italy. I had that bag for years and it went everywhere with me. I didn't think I could find one as good. But as soon as I opened this bag, I knew it was better! The pockets are roomy and I can get my hand inside. The detachable bag will carry my meds so I can check the bigger toiletry bag and carry the small one with me. It's built such that it will still fold up even with a lot of stuff in it. Such a nice surprise to find one I like even better than my old favorite!
customer_reviews.author: rabidreader

customer_reviews.title: it's a pretty travel bag
customer_reviews.text: ...but haven't used it yet. I can't wait to use it, however, because when we went camping last week, I brought so many different bags and it was aggrevating to find what I needed. I had a bag for makeup, one for meds, one for jewelry, and one for misc. And, to top it off, I had a bigger bag for pharmacuticals such as bandaids, my doTERRA oils, my fur babies allergy meds, peroxide, etc. So, this bag, after opening it up and looking it over will be PERFECT for my needs. You know women need to have all the necessities with us; it's a mom thing
customer_reviews.author: ALANA

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large toiletry bag. It holds everything I use for travel with room to spare. I like that it zips completely closed. Other customers mentioned that the zipper is challenging. After a few uses, the zippers on my bag worked just fine. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for all my travel sized products
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to travel with this bag, but I was able to fill it completely with all my travel sized products for a week’s trip. I was afraid it was going to be too big because it showed full sized products in the ad, but I needed every bit of space for all my products, medication, etc. it seems well made, but time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Grammy C.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but....
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something with pockets large enough to actually fit full size bottles in and this fits the bill. It folds up nicely then zips shut. It also has a hook on it so it can be hung up with quick accessibility to your products. Will be using it on a cruise in a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki O

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: This holds everything and more! I usually find mysrlf bringing multiple bags to carry toiletries and makeup on trips, but nit anymore! This bag is roomy, folds up and zips nicely even when full. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: iamkcs

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for a trip to Spain. This worked perfectly for storing all of my toiletries and making it easy and convenient for repacking between destinations, just folded it up and threw it in my suitcase. It’s well made, very cute and I cannot believe how much it holds! Look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Milam

customer_reviews.title: Nice and practical
customer_reviews.text: This travel bag is just as expected. I was looking for something to replace my old bag that is falling apart. It's great; all my makeup, travel hair products, hair accessories fit in it. It also fits well in my suitcase, since some of my products I travel with are full size and cannot put in carry-on bag. I like the removable makeup bag option so that I can keep it separately on the bathroom counter. Very nice product!!
customer_reviews.author: sammie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My job requires alot of travel and staying in different places..naturally as a woman I have my toiletries, makeup, so on and so forth. It always surprises me how much I actually need and use until it's packed in 2 different bags! This is the first travel bag that held ALL of my things and as a bonus super cute! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for everything
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I knew immediately it was the perfect size to hold all of my travel essentials, essentially replacing four separate bags I was packing. I had to return the first one because it was missing the zip on pocket. The replacement was just delivered, with the zip on pocket attached. I've already emptied all of my smaller bags and repacked it in this...with room to spare. I cant speak to durability yet, but the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best Travel Toiletry Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this travel bag! It holds large sized hair products, body lotions, toothpaste, etc. and is perfect for a long trip. All my things are now so organized and I can see everything. I hang it on the back of the bathroom door and there it stays for the duration. I used to have several small travel bags and they were always in the way on the bathroom counter. The bag is very cute and so far seems durable. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this organizer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this organizer! I bought this for a 12 day trip my husband and I took, it was great! It held all of our toiletries, and we were able to use the smaller pockets to store medication and toothbrushes. It folds up smaller than I would have expected and fit nicely in a corner of my suitcase. I loved that the pockets are all clear so you can easily see what you are looking for without having to dig through all the pockets.
customer_reviews.author: tabj

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This was like the I used for over 10 years and finally wore out. Couldn't find the style and size, and Walmart anymore. I like the way these are designed. Can stand upright on the counter or lay flat.I don't get the need for the hanger like my other one. Love the size and and the clear compartments. Tall items and everything fits.
customer_reviews.author: WhiteRose

customer_reviews.title: The ideal cosmetic bag
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to organize all my cosmetics when I travel. I used it for the first time and it was gorgeous because I arrived to my hotel and I just hanged the bag in the bathroom door. I could find every cosmetic rapidly since all the compartments inside are made of a clear plastic and with a zipper each one. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Hagger

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This little travel bag is big enough to accommodate all of my travel accessories however there are loose threads and strings around the zippers. Those keep getting in the way and getting hung up in the zippers. That's a little bit annoying. This could definitely be improved upon.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Morrison

customer_reviews.title: My 23 year old daughter LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked how much this holds. My daughter looked at it and had no response UNTIL she started putting things in it, then she couldn’t stop talking about how much she loves it! She lives make up and this holds a lot of things
customer_reviews.author: Ela

customer_reviews.title: Hook ripped
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag for a little while but the hook portion that is attached to the bag ripped almost immediately. This should not have happened. It was just hanging there and had normally items in it and it started with a small rip then it kept growing because of weight I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Hertel

customer_reviews.title: This is bag is a tavel must!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is fabulous. I was able to take everything i needed for two weeks in Thailand and still had space if i needed it. I love that it folds up so nice and neat and the detachable makeup bag was great for carrying just the essentials during our flights.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Langley

customer_reviews.title: We'll made and has room for full size bottles.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag that would fit in my suitcase, but still carry full size bottles if needed. I haven't used it yet but I'm pleased with the size and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Collins

customer_reviews.title: One bag for personal items
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to combine a smaller bag with a large bag for different locations when camping. Inevitably I was leaving things out when switching. This bag can work for me in many settings and holds all of my toiletries. It is durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8gal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this travel bag!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this travel bag! I bought 6 of them in total for all of my female family members. Extra bonus is that little zip pocket at the bottom zips off so you can use it to store your phone and keys at the beach!!!
customer_reviews.author: EA McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Really a well made bag. More pricey than some alternatives on here but it is worth it. There is so much space but it folds up extremely nicely and there's extra little pockets and everything. My only complaint is that the zipper can be annoying but it's tolerable. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact but holds alot
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed. I have been using this larger bag to hold all of my cosmetics/toiletries for travel purposes and it just was not convenient. This travel bag is the perfect size and has large enough compartments to organize and fit all of my cosmetics and toiletries. You can hang it in the hotel bathroom, tent or wherever you are at for the night. So happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian M. Yslava

customer_reviews.title: Classy makeup travel tote
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy and works well for makeup products. Zippers are very stiff, not sure how to make the, glide easier. Love the polka dot color. A nice addition to my travel “stuff”
customer_reviews.author: J. Berger

customer_reviews.title: It holds EVERYTHING!
customer_reviews.text: This case holds a LOT of stuff. I used it for my daughters dance recital. I had an extra large size hair spray, full size brush, makeup, the works. It hangs very nicely too. I would totally recommend this and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: UnicornMom

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, perfect size, great layout.everything fits!!! I bought two, one for me, one for gift. I did a lot of homework, finding the perfect bag...this it it!
customer_reviews.author: S Majors

customer_reviews.title: It’s so great.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found the one. I have others and they don’t hold nearly as much as I need to travel with. This is so functional and it’s pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this recently for a weeklong trip and was super pleased to have everything well organized and conveniently at my fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great size and generous pockets
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate it's durability, as I haven't used the bag yet. On a recent cruise, the bathroom sink was pedestal and there were only two small shelves in the bathroom, so I had to do most of my "beauty" routine elsewhere. If I had had this bag, I could have done everything at the mirror in the bathroom. I plan to take the bag on all trips in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Giffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfact size
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! Perfact size , love the zippoff pouch and zipper on the outside too. I don’t know why I waited so long!
customer_reviews.author: Retired yes!

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Quality material that seems like it will hold up. Nicely sized compartments that fit more than I thought they would at first glance. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Excellent product for holding all of my essentials. Cuts down on suitcase space. I like all the pockets, nooks, and zippered pockets.
customer_reviews.author: MEMA

customer_reviews.title: Roomy & Generous storage.
customer_reviews.text: I have been very happy with this bag. It is roomy and everything is within easy reach with all the compartments.
customer_reviews.author: MMC

customer_reviews.title: YES GET THIS BAG!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this bag! I found the perfect one to hold all my stuff! Nice material, cute polka dots/hot pink, and very nice zippers! Love love it!
customer_reviews.author: teacher4life

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: This travel bag has lots of compartments and is a nice size. Well made and pretty. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for traveling. Lots of pockets and room for what you need. Well constructed and good price. The only reason why I didn’t give it 5 stars is because of the door hook not being wide enough and didn’t swivel. So it sat funny on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Grace

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase!!! I bought this for an upcoming vacation and was pleasantly surprised by the amount of room it had.. I probably would've fit everything if I wasn't also trying to fit my husband's stuff as well. Highly recommend!!! I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie S.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and functional
customer_reviews.text: I typically prefer smaller pockets for smaller travel items but it’s very functional and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Large Versatile Travel Cosmetic Bag - Perfect Hanging Travel Toiletry Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! hung on a hook in bathroom. easily accessible to make up, toiletries,etc...
customer_reviews.author: D K

customer_reviews.title: Roominess
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern and looks of it..........very roomy and folds up neatly!!! Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia R Svee

customer_reviews.title: It's large enough for what I'll need it for and I like that it can be hung up for easy access ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the travel bag...It's large enough for what I'll need it for and I like that it can be hung up for easy access to my things. I won't be using it until next month but the construction seems durable and the design is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Love...great for long trips!
customer_reviews.text: Very very nice case particularly for a long trip. It is large and can be packed with multiply items. If you are looking for something compact or small do not get this item. :) Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and convenient spacious I bought one for myself and now one for my friend birthday
customer_reviews.author: kellybelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel companion!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying the travel bag. It fits everything I need for extended stays. I like the handles n the hook to hang it and have easy access to my toiletries. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza G

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need, right there!
customer_reviews.text: I usually travel with a bunch of small bags: 1 for makeup, 1 for toiletries, etc. but everything fit so nicely in this bag, it made it so much easier to get ready each day. I only which I haven’t waited so long to get one!
customer_reviews.author: Reem Dabbas

customer_reviews.title: Travel must have
customer_reviews.text: I love my little travel bag. Makes my life so much easier when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Well made & roomy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s well made, roomy. I like the zip off pouch you can throw in your purse. In fact, it works so well I bought my daughter one for our upcoming cruise!
customer_reviews.author: Mari B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. Great replacement for my old one. Holds everything I need and more. I am considering ordering another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to pack
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it is compact and easy to pack..I was afraid to let it hang when it was full as I thought the plastic might give way..otherwise it was convenient for travel
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: A great but
customer_reviews.text: Works well hold a lot of makeup as well as brushes too. Great to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Watch out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag 6 months ago and have been loving it - 5 stars for sure. BUT THEN, one of the zippers broke and now the whole inside upper pocket is useless. I'm so bummed, especially since Amazon said it's too late to exchange it. I didn't overfill or do anything that would have caused the zipper to break. Hopefully I can keep using but it won't be nearly as convenient and I'm afraid to buy another one. It should've lasted more than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Walker Koche

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: this fits all of my travel toiletries with no problem. would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J.

customer_reviews.title: It has LOTS of storage in a rather small size - LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: It is EXACTLY the right size and the item arrived as promised. It has LOTS of storage in a rather small size - LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: KKF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, roomy, well made!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is FABULOUS! It has sooo much room and is very well made. The cost is well worth it, this bag will be my go to for a long time. My husband's toiletries, my toiletries, makeup and extras fit nicely with room to spare. Love love love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift and my wife loved it!! She can't wait for our next trip to be able to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlin R Havener

customer_reviews.title: Practical, roomy & pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my dearly loved & long used travel cosmetic bag & has looked for quite sometime for the perfect replacement. I found it! When this new bag arrived, I quickly moved all my things to the bag & am so happy that it all went in very nicely. I travel a LOT so these things are critical. It will travel many miles with me & help make my life easier!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyD

customer_reviews.title: Fits plenty of items
customer_reviews.text: Love this toiletry bag. Fits full size bottles. Love that the pockets are clear plastic. Easy to find what you need and easy to wash if there's a leak.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.text: Like being able to hang up so can see everything I have in one place
customer_reviews.author: Michele Dunkin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cosmetic bad is so great and fits everything so perfectly. It expands well on the sides
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The perfect travel bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it folds up smoothly even when full- and there is room for all of the stuff I use the most- including my makeup! It’s very nice looking too!
customer_reviews.author: SHANON L. EDWARDS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was very impressed by the quality of this Bag! Made of thick fabric and has a good zipper! I was very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a travel bag, fits perfectly in my suitcase. Can get all my necessities and makeup into the zippered compartments, love the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Bigger on the inside
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I’m using it as a cosmetic bag. It’s deceptively big. It holds a lot of products and looks small when closed. No one would believe all my products would fit just by looking
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel piece!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, lots of room, lots of pockets, perfect hanging system and cute polka dot pattern. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: QUIqui

customer_reviews.title: Rough zipper
customer_reviews.text: Nice and roomy fior the price but am disappointed in the zipper. It is rough and little hard to maneuver and sometimes have to pull the fabric away from the zipper to keep it from getting caught.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: This travel bar is a little different than the ones I’ve used before which were more like a Caboodle shape. But everything fits right in plus I can see all my stuff without having to dig around.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was needed to organize all my makeup and beauty products. Lots of room!! Love that the makeup bag is detachable!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn E

customer_reviews.title: Ripped within first two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I like the spaciousness of this produxt, but th materials don't support the size. My bag ripped where the hanger attaches in the first two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: KatzeChicX

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!!  So much room
customer_reviews.text: I love the size, it holds everything I need for traveling. Even for weekend travel, I leave it pack ready to go anytime. Made well and pretty
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Markham

customer_reviews.title: Fits in carry on!
customer_reviews.text: It said large, I was concerned it would be to large. It fits nicely when full in my carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Wicked Witch

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bag for over 2 years and it’s still in good shape despite using it often and stuffing it to capacity. It has a huge capacity and organizes all of my cosmetics and toiletries perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag so much that I may order a few more. Lots of space and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Darlin

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel bag. It is the perfect size not too big not too small. Really good quality
customer_reviews.author: ellen beekman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Cute and functional! Love that I can fit full sized items as well as many travel sized items. Has several pockets for organizing and another detachable pocket. It was perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds more than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my use! Great size and fits more than expected!
customer_reviews.author: DianaTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Great travelling bag.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It holds even more than I expected. The whole bag unfolds so everything is visible. I just wish I'd purchased this sooner. I'm sure you will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: Travel bag arrived promptly. This travel bag has plenty of storage compartments that allows you to pack travel sized and large sized personal items. The construction of the bag seems durable and study. Also the color is vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: sharay

customer_reviews.title: Well organized
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for travel. It really helps in organizing toiletries, makeup, and other accessories
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette Kea

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 other travel cosmetic bags before I found this wonderful bag! I LOVE this bag
customer_reviews.text: I went through about 3 other travel cosmetic bags before I found this wonderful bag! I LOVE this bag! I thought it might be too big and bulky, but it's really compact and holds SO MUCH STUFF! The quality is great and did I mention how much stuff it holds without being too bulky?! Would buy this one again if I had to!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn C

customer_reviews.title: This one rock!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice one with many compartments, very well organized spacious. You can put here one month stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lemons

customer_reviews.title: Large capacity
customer_reviews.text: This bag holds everything Ibmeed for my upcoming trip. I am happy so far about the capacity. It will also store full size bottles but you have to lay them sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Art Supplies too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to create to store Art Supplies...when I sm traveling. I love this bag... the separate sections are perfect for storeing paint, paint brushes, paper and the Art Journal itself!
customer_reviews.author: Helen M

customer_reviews.title: However it seems very sturdy and provides several individual storage compartments
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. However it seems very sturdy and provides several individual storage compartments.
customer_reviews.author: marion mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter and she loves it! Works great and fits all of her stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was hoping for this trip. I'm sure I will use it for more local jaunts.
customer_reviews.author: comfypants

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Just took it on my first trip and everything fits!! Ordering one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lasley

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cute, great size
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable cosmetic bag, great size and really cute. It fits my travel items perfectly, plenty of room. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any traveler
customer_reviews.text: Made very well. Fits so much. I had a week long conference and it held everything in one bag instead of multiple bags.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hart

customer_reviews.title: Holds Larger Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I really like this travel bag for my toiletries. This is big enough for larger bottles that I carry when traveling by car on vacation. It is always packed for weekend road trips!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Large enough to carry multiple toiletries and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Durability and size
customer_reviews.text: I’m planning on using this product for traveling. I’ll be using it for the first time in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Magielda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel bag for full size items. Helps to keep your things well organized. Get it
customer_reviews.author: KB

product_meta.title: Large Travel Cosmetic Bag For Women - Hanging Travel Toiletry And Makeup Bag With Many Pockets in Polka Dot
feature_bullets: ✅ PERFECT TOILETRY TRAVEL BAG FOR WOMEN: Travel-friendly toiletry and cosmetic organizer with multiple zippered, clear pockets: easy to see and to take.

✅ REAL LARGE SIZE HANGING TRAVEL MAKEUP BAG: 12" x 9" x 4" WITH PRACTICAL DESIGN. You can easily fit standard size toiletry bottles into it. This nice looking and very practical makeup bag comes with: comfortable top carry handles, one front big size zippered pocket, top zip closure, three large transparent zippered compartments, and one, practical, detachable pouch and steady metal hanger.

✅ VERSATILE AND MULTIFUNCTION TRAVEL COSMETIC ORGANIZER: Large outside pocket holds a lot of additional items for easy access when the bag is closed. Three transparent interior compartments and a detachable zippered pouch for smaller items. The unfolded toiletry bag can be hung from a variety of fixtures. (Please, do not overweight it).
✅ WELL MADE AND DURABLE: This exceptional toiletry travel bag is made of sturdy, high quality polyester, waterproof nylon lining, elastic PVC and tough zipper. It will match all your expectations.

✅ TRAVEL MADE EASY: Toiletry and cosmetic bags from Bag&Carry are must have for all active travelers and an ideal gift for your family and friends. They are a great and classy way to store your toiletries and other belongings.
